import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBInput, MDBIcon, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; function App() { const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if ( username.length > 4 && email.substring(email.length - 10) === "@gmail.com" && password.length > 7 ) { window.location.href = "/homepage"; } else { alert("enter details properly"); } }; return ( <>

setUsername(e.target.value)} />

UserName must be minimum of 5 characters

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />

Password must be minimum of 8 characters

); } export default App;
